items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is a trading firm, indicating a positive start for the day. Wall Street stocks ended mixed on Friday, with Nvidiaclimbing and Microsoft dipping, while Treasury yields declined a day after U.S. President Donald Trump unveiled reciprocal tariff plans but stopped short of imposing new ones.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a firm opening; US markets mixed, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street stocks ended mixed on Friday, with Nvidiaclimbing and Microsoft dipping, while Treasury yields declined a day after U.S. President Donald Trump unveiled reciprocal tariff plans but stopped short of imposing new ones.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Bajaj Finance, ICICI Bank, Tata Consumer Products, Redington, Kaveri Seed, and others on February 17?
items.description: The market is expected to consolidate further, with last week's low acting as support. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Alembic Pharma, BHEL, Zydus Life, Zen Technologies, Ajax Engineering, Utkarsh SFB, Glenmark in focus on 17 February
items.description: Stocks To Watch, Feb 17: Stocks like Narayana Hrudayalaya, Dilip Buildcon, NRB Bearings, Rail Vikas Nigam, Borosil Renewables, Aditya Birla Fashion & Retail, La Opala RG, Dish TV India, Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers and Chemicals, Easy Trip Planners, Wipro,Ujjivan Small Finance Bank, and Shriram Finance will be in focus on February 17.

items.title: IT sector’s stable technology budgets may face macro headwinds
items.description: Industry consultants and managements of IT companies indicate a stable or relatively better technology spending in 2025

items.title: DOMS Industries: Gaining traction with consistent performance
items.description: The integration of the Uniclan business, continuous capacity addition, and diversified product segment are driving growth

items.title: Agri Picks Report February 17, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, The Cotton Association of India has lowered its January estimate for the country's cotton production for 2024-25 (OctSept) to 30.18 million bales (1 bale = 170 kg). In December, it had estimated the country's cotton production at 30.43 million bales.

items.title: Live: How much can Nifty fall if it breaks below 22,800? | Opening Bell
items.description: Indian markets extended losses for the eighth straight day, marking first such decline in two years. Amidst broad-based selloff, Nifty slipped below 22,950 amid FII outflows and US President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariff jitters. This week, investors will keenly watch out FII flows, Trump's tariff announcements, and rupee-dollar rate. Among stocks, watch out for Aditya Birla Fashion, Utkarsh Small Finance Bank, and RVNL in today's trading session. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Sudeep Shah, Head of Technical & Derivative Research, SBI Securities and Mayuresh Joshi, Head - Equity Research India, William O'Neil and Company.

items.title: MC Pro Budget 2025 Portfolio: 18 stocks to benefit from an eventual market revival
items.description: The MC Pro Research team has combined a top-down approach taking inspiration from the budget with bottom-up stock picking, giving due consideration to valuations amid market volatility

items.title: RVNL shares drop 7% after firm's Q3 net profit declines 13% to Rs 311 crore
items.description: The railway company's revenue from operations declined nearly 3 percent year-on-year to Rs 4,567 crore in Q3 FY25.

items.title: Zen Tech share price hits 20% lower circuit after Q3 numbers
items.description: While Zen Tech's Q3 earnings showed year-on-year growth, a sharp decline was seen when compared to the previous quarter.

items.title: United Breweries, United Spirits shares jitter after India lowers tariff on US whiskies
items.description: The revised tariff applies solely to bourbon whiskies, which are uniquely produced and aged in the U.S., while all other alcoholic beverages remain taxed at the previous 150% rate.

items.title: Garden Reach Shipbuilders: Strong order pipeline to support higher valuations
items.description: The company has a strong earnings visibility and its execution track record is impressive

items.title: Nifty Bank recovers 600 points from day's low; IndusInd, HDFC Bank shares gain up to 2%
items.description: The shares of IndusInd Bank were the top gainer on the index, trading over 2 percent higher at Rs 1,046 apiece

items.title: Accumulate ACC; target of Rs 2134: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services recommended accumulate rating on ACC with a target price of Rs 2134 in its research report dated February 17, 2025.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty come sharply off day's lows but still on track to clock nine-day losing run
items.description: Unless the Sensex and Nifty 50 stage a decisive rebound into the green, the benchmarks are on track for their ninth straight decline, a losing streak last witnessed in 2019.

items.title: Small, midcap indices tumble in a broad-based downturn: Key stocks under selling pressure
items.description: ICICI Pru AMC's veteran CIO S Naren had advised caution regarding SIP investment in mid and smallcap stocks. "We think it is a clear time to take out lock, stock, and barrel from small- and mid-caps," he had said.

items.title: Borosil Renewable shares hit 5% lower circuit as losses widen in Q3
items.description: Pricing pressure, high input costs and weak operational performance weighed heavily on Borosil Renewables' Q3 earnings show.

items.title: Godfrey Phillips shares extend gains to second day, soars 44%
items.description: Godfrey Phillips reported a robust 48.7 percent YoY surge in net profit for the December quarter

items.title: Samvardhana Motherson shares fall over 2 percent as brokerages trim targets after Q3FY25
items.description: The company's net profit gained 62 percent YoY while its revenue from operations gained over 35 percent and EBITDA grew over 7 percent.

items.title: Senco Gold shares dives 15% as weak Q3 earnings deepens correction
items.description: Senco Gold's share price fell to its 20 percent lower circuit in the last session, driven by weak sentiment following the company's disappointing Q3 earnings performance.

items.title: Accumulate Granules India; target of Rs 580: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services recommended accumulate rating on Granules India with a target price of Rs 580 in its research report dated February 17, 2025.

items.title: Top gainers and losers: Stocks that moved the most on February 17
items.description: The BSE Midcap index too saw a smart recovery, while BSE Smallcap continue to see selling pressure.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty, Sensex snap 8-day fall; financial, metal, pharma stocks shine
items.description: Broader indices performance remained mix as BSE Midcap index ended 0.5 percent higher, while the smallcap index was down 0.6 percent

items.title: Live: Sensex, Nifty rebound 1% from intraday lows, breaks 8-day loss | Closing Bell
items.description: Bulls fight back! Markets rebound after 8 days. Sensex, Nifty recover 1% from intra-day lows. Majority of sectors trim losses, pharma top leader. Nifty Auto, Nifty IT indices worst sectoral performers. Midcaps lead broader markets recovery, up 0.6%. Smallcaps continue to face the heat, down 0.3%.  Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.
